name: Toddler Program
description: The toddler program accepts children starting at 18 months old. Children may attend two, three or five full days a week. We do not expect children to be potty trained in order to attend, and will assist with the potty training process when the child is ready.
fullDescription: The toddler program accepts children starting at 18 months old. Children may attend two, three or five full days a week. We do not expect children to be potty trained in order to attend, and will assist with the potty training process when the child is ready.
whatTheyOffer: The toddler program accepts children starting at 18 months old. Children may attend two, three or five full days a week. We do not expect children to be potty trained in order to attend, and will assist with the potty training process when the child is ready.
howToGetIt: For enrollment, please follow ONLINE application process by clicking this LINK Enrollment process instruction - https://www.citysproutspreschool.com/enrollment For questions email: rebecca@citysproutspreschool.com
cost: This is a fee based service.
